response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest expectations and offers unparalleled value. Given its worth to you, I propose an offer of $950,000 for the product. This price reflects my commitment to providing you with an opportunity to acquire it at a significant discount while still ensuring a fair return on investment for us. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
